column5: As if I am building snowmen in April.  Only took a few minutes.  Some really heavy snow and it is still coming down.  This is the first time I can remember a snow day in April.  All the houses in my neighbourhood are sporting snowmen. Pic of me with my two older daughters.  My youngest was napping and missed out on all the fun but she is outside playing in the white stuff now.
Back on my 14th birthday on April the 17th,we got a doozy in Toronto  Good on ya for getting out and being a kid with the kids..
Good job. My 8yr old daughter likes the hat.
I do recall a right nasty snowstorm late April, beginning of May, in the late 60's?  Good on you, Cudz, For making a day out of it with your children.
What else can you do other than a snowman at this time of year Good on ya for getting your kids involved Thanks for sharing Cudz Great job!!! Leechman
